LanguageData.Apparello_Skullhood.label: 人骨面具
LanguageData.Apparello_Skullhood.description: A partial mask crafted out of a human's skull. There is something very unsettling about it.
LanguageData.Apparello_HornedHead.label: 长角面具
LanguageData.Apparello_HornedHead.description: Lovingly crafted out of sturdiest horned head garment. You can almost feel the spirit of this brave animal beast within you. It's very warm and horny.
LanguageData.Apparello_Slughood.label: 厚皮面具
LanguageData.Apparello_Slughood.description: A head piece that was lovingly crafted out of thick leather. You can almost feel the spirit of this determined beast within you.
